    • Constructor Detail

      • JSONConfigProvider

        public JSONConfigProvider(Path filePath)
                   throws dejv.commons.config.ConfigException
        Initialize the JSON backend, and link it to the physical file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the file to load (resp. store) the configuration from (resp. to).
        Throws:
        dejv.commons.config.ConfigException - When it is not possible to open the file on the given path.
